data.persona: I am the most powerful man in the country. I like that people fear me. I will destroy all that oppose me.
data.description:
You are in the kitchens.
The kitchens of the tower are a giant kabob of tables and cans of herbs and various condiments. Some VERY fresh meats are found here as well. So fresh they are... well, alive. You see holding cells for various fowl and beast in a pen in the room. The smell is not very pleasant, but the food generally tastes a lot better.
The maid is here.

You are carrying a crown and a scepter, and wearing a cape.

data.short_motivation: I need to give the broom to the maid
data.mid_motivation: I want the maid to clean up the mess that I have made
data.long_motivation: I need to impress my guests at the masquerade and do not want to forget to clean up this mess
